pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate ED50 Based on Modified Turning Point Method // Turning point method is a method proposed by Choi (1990) doi:10.2307/2531453 to estimate 50 percent effective dose (ED50) in the study of drug sensitivity. The method has its own advantages for that it can provide robust ED50 estimation. This package contains the modified function of Choi's turning point method.
